channel.title: Authors on Benjamin Heinzerling
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Benjamin Heinzerling

item.description: Research scientist at RIKEN and Tohoku University. Aiming to understand if/how language models understand language. Specific research interests are at the interesection of knowledge bases and language models, including questions such as how world knowledge is represented in language models, how internal representations relate to model behavior, and if language models can “know” anything at all. Prior to joining the language understanding team at RIKEN, Benjamin received a PhD in computational linguistics from Heidelberg University.
